Hi, I'm Yuan Zheng.

I'm a UX & Product Designer interested in promoting scientific literacy through design. I have over 5 years research experience on studying biomedical science. I was a Ph.D. candidate in University of Minnesota where I got six published papers as first / (co-) author. In my free time, I like dancing and sniffing my cat !
